name: Are you finding it difficult to breathe?
Do you have any nose congestion or a runny nose?
Do you feel tired or dizzy?
Are you experiencing headaches or chestpain?
Do you have bodyache or muscle pain?
Are you experiencing nausea or diarrhea?
Do you have an impaired sense of smell or taste?
Do you have any history of diabetes or heart problems?
Have you been in contact with anyone who has been diagnosed with COVID-19?
